title: Cloned world name in log message

content.raw:
When following the  [Clone a simulation](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=clone_simulation&cat=physics) tutorial, I noticed the world name in the logs is empty, while in the tutorial it says `default`.

~~~
(1516843988 525456678) Cloning world []. Connect to the server by typing:
	GAZEBO_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11346 gzclient
~~~

The following patch should fix it:

~~~
diff -r afe088345718 gazebo/Server.cc
--- a/gazebo/Server.cc	Mon Jan 08 17:39:01 2018 +0000
+++ b/gazebo/Server.cc	Wed Jan 24 17:36:04 2018 -0800
@@ -665,6 +665,7 @@
       try
       {
         world = physics::get_world(worldName);
+        worldName = world->GetName();
       }
       catch(const common::Exception &)
       {
~~~
content.html:
When following the Clone a simulation tutorial, I noticed the world name in the logs is empty, while in the tutorial it says default.

(1516843988 525456678) Cloning world []. Connect to the server by typing:
    GAZEBO_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11346 gzclient

The following patch should fix it:

diff -r afe088345718 gazebo/Server.cc
--- a/gazebo/Server.cc  Mon Jan 08 17:39:01 2018 +0000
+++ b/gazebo/Server.cc  Wed Jan 24 17:36:04 2018 -0800
@@ -665,6 +665,7 @@
       try
       {
         world = physics::get_world(worldName);
+        worldName = world->GetName();
       }
       catch(const common::Exception &)
       {
